$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: Reference to JSON schema of this config

default_qgis_server_url.description: Default base URL for forwarding WMS GetLegendGraphics requests. Default: `http://localhost:8001/ows/`

network_timeout.description: Network timeout for requests forwarded to the QGIS Server, in seconds. Default: `30`

qgis_server_url_tenant_suffix.description: If qgs_resources are placed in tenant specific subdirs, set this property to the respective subdir path portion. Default: `<empty>`

legend_default_font_size.description: Default font size for GetLegendGraphic request. Default: `null`

legend_images_path.description: Path to legend images (required if using `legend_image`). Default: `/legends/`

basic_auth_login_url.description: Login verification URL for requests with basic auth. Example: `http://qwc-auth-service:9090/verify_login`. Default: `null`

qgis_server_identity_parameter.description: Name of the GET parameter through which the active QWC user will be sent to QGIS Server, to be used i.e. in plugins. Default: `QWC_USERNAME`

items.title: WMS service
items.description: WMS service with nested layers and group layers

root_layer.description: Root layer of WMS (layer or group layer)

layers.description: Sublayers of this group layer (layers or group layers)

hide_sublayers.description: Hide sublayers of this group layer if set, to make the group layer look like a regular layer (Facade layer)

legend_image.description: Legend image path relative to 'legend_images_path' (only if hide_sublayers is set)

legend_image_base64.description: Legend image in Base64 encoding (only if hide_sublayers is set)
